title: Here's how the new $400 Apple Watch Series 5 compares to last year's model
text:
On Tuesday, Apple announced the newest version of its smartwatch, the Apple Watch Series 5.

The new watch is an updated version of 2018's Series 4, which Apple will no longer sell. The Series 5 comes with an always-on Retina display for the first time, as well as improved health and emergency calling features. Apple will sell the Series 5 alongside the less pricey Series 3.

The Apple Watch Series 5 has some features that might make an upgrade worth the money. Here, we broke down the differences between the models to help you decide.
description: The new Apple Watch is an updated version of 2018's Apple Watch Series 4, which Apple will no longer sell.
